item.title: Trump wants mass deportations. For the agents removing immigrants, itâ€™s a painstaking process
item.description: Donald Trump has promised to undertake mass deportations. That job would largely fall to the approximately 6,000 federal enforcement and removal officers nationwide.

item.title: Trump again calls to buy Greenland after eyeing Canada and the Panama Canal
Many Americans have come to rely on Chinese-made drones. Now lawmakers want to ban them
